fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.exception.SmppException

  • Packages that use SmppException 
    Package Description
    fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.exception  
    fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.session  

    • Uses of SmppException in fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.exception

      Subclasses of SmppException in fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConnectionFailedException
      Specialized exception that indicates that the session couldn't be bound (connection failed).
      class  KeepAliveException
      In order to avoid creating a new session for each message to send, Ogha provides different strategies to handle the sessions.
      class  SessionException
      This exception indicates that the failure is due to the handling of the session itself and not raised while sending the SMS.

    • Uses of SmppException in fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.session
